// click mouse and move
void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    float N = 60.0;//elements size
    vec2 coord = fragCoord - (iResolution.xy / vec2(2.0));//simmetric
    float x = float(coord.x); float y = float(coord.y);//coordinates from center
    float t = pow(1.01, iTime);//animation speed 
    float dx = iMouse.x-iResolution.x/2.0;//mouse move x
    float dy = iMouse.y-iResolution.y/2.0;//mouse move y
    float f = float((x-dx)*(x-dx)*t+(y-dy)*(y-dy)*t);//the puck
    float F = abs(f*log2(abs(sin((x+dx/2.2)/N)*sin((y+dy/2.2)/N))));//create parallax matrix of telescopic rotators
    int R = int(floor(F*pow(16.0, 6.0-ceil(log2(F)/4.0)))); //adapt COLOR for X11
    fragColor = vec4(
        float(((R) >> 16)& 255) / 255.0,//red 
        float(((R) >> 8) & 255) / 255.0,//green
        float(((R) >> 0) & 255) / 255.0,//blue
        1.0
    );
}
